Austin Hatch

A place for you, the admirer, to get to know me.

Begin

Who Am I?

This is indeed the question. See I've been asking myself that for quite some time, and I truly think that nobody knows the answer. Indeed I may say that of all people, I myself am on a quest to answer that very question. But if you must know, check out my resume because I could really, really use a good job right about now.

I'm strong...

I was... almost... a state champion wrestler in high school. There's a whole sob story that I won't bore you with. But now I do Jiujitsu so you never need to be scared while I'm around... I can break their arms and win your heart, babe. I have something for you sporty girls.

I'm a Superhero

It's okay if you haven't heard, but I'm pretty much a super hero... almost. Like to about 200 LDS kids I'm the coolest shiz in the entire world. So I got a heart of gold for you guys too.

Mountains

I... almost... climbed the tallest mountain in Wyoming. It was a 60 mile hike and we almost died because our water pump broke... quite a man if I do say so myself. Got something for those granola girls.

Don't Fall Over Yourseles...
